name: Slow Cooker Butter Chicken Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: chicken breast, salt, pepper, curry powder, garam masala, chili powder, onion, garlic cloves, tomato puree, natural yogurt, coconut milk, butter, rice, coriander
recipeInstructionSteps: In a slow cooker, throw in all the ingredients and mix to combine.
Place the lid on and cook on high for 4 hours.
Serve with rice and fresh coriander.
